title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message:
Hi, 
i have this board 820-3115 with no green led.
I check this voltage:
PPDCIN_G3H=16,53V
PPVIN_G3H_P3V42G3H=16,13V
PP3V42_G3H_REG=3,495V (each side of L6995)
PPBUS_G3H=12,6V
P18V5_DCIN_CONN_R=16,41V
SMC_BC_ACOK=3,35V
what can i check more?
thanks

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message: i add more informations: no liquid, I use a power supply instead of magsafe board (16,5V display 0,02A)

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message: Bad magsafe board? Does this board power on from a charged battery?

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message:
No the magsafe board is good, and the board don't boot with battery charged and pad power on.
Do you have an idea duke?

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message: Voltage on pins 1, 4 and 5 from U6900 and on pin 5 from J6900??

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message: I don't care about one-wire at the moment as it also does not power from a battery. SMC seems to be running as PPBUS is at 12.56V. What is voltage on SMC_ONOFF?

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message:
Hi
U6900 1,4,5 = 3,349V
J6900 5= 3,349V, sorry but the green led is here with another magsafe board, the led blink no really fix, but J6900 pin 5 on scope is good. but the board no boot, no fan, no display.
SMC_ONOFF=3,349V
thanks for your help

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message:
So much for a good magsafe board...... :(

Check R7005, R7021/22/51/52. You sure this does not power from a known working battery?

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message:
Ok i confirm, i test with another good battery not start when i short the pad start.
R7005=22ohm
R7021=12,5
R7022=12,5
R7051=3,1
R7052=0,3

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message: G2_EN present? PP3V3_S5 present?

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message:
SMC_PM_G2_EN=0v Pin2 U7941
PP3V3_S5=0V pin 6 U7941 & R7951

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message: Seems like the SMC to me.

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message: Can i take it on a donate board?

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message: Take from identical donor.

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message: ok can you confirm me it's U4900? how do you do to reball the chipset? sorry for this question but i haven't skill about that.

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message:
With a stencil, or by hand with a microscope and a bit of time.
There is SMC replacement videos on youtube for more information.

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message: ok i see the video with louis, i find the stencil. thanks i post the result when i do the replacement.

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message:
Ok i change the SMC and now i have SMC_PM_G2_EN=3,35v Pin2 U7941
PP3V3_S5=0V always, don't boot again. :(

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message: Voltage on pin 6 from U7200?? Resistance to ground on L7220 without power applied of course...

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message:
Have you checked for shorts on PP3v3_s5 rail ?

If none are present whats voltage on pin 5 Q7221 ?

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message:
U7000 pin 6 = 3,469V
R to G L7220 = 5,33Kohm
PP3V3_S5 is not short (5,33Kohm)
Q7221 pin 5 = 0V

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message: Pin 5 on Q7221 is low and that is correct. 3v3_s5 should be enabled. Seems like U7200 issue, check VREG3 and VREG5 and EN0. Replace chip.

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message:
VREG 3 = 0V
VREG5 = 12,59V
EN0=3,45V
i need to replace the chip?

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message: Check again, 12.59V is way to high, should be 5V...  If EN0 is high VREG3 should come high too, this seems to be a bad U7200...

title: 820-3115 no green led, no boot
message:
Are you measuring the right pin? VREG5 should be 5v. You're getting 12.59v because you're measuring on C7272 instead of c7273 aren't you? 

Check voltage on pin C7273!
